title: Driver satisfaction with Uber U.S. 2017 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Responses for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 3 groups, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Somewhat agree and 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Strongly disagree.
Among all the Responses, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 434.0 in Response Somewhat agree and lowest value 82.0 in Response Strongly disagree.
There is a gap of 352.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2018 in Response Somewhat agree and Strongly disagree.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Response Somewhat agree had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 3 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response Strongly disagree for 2018.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Responses for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 3 groups, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Somewhat agree and 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Strongly disagree.
Among all the Responses, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL 434.0 in Response Somewhat agree and lowest value 82.0 in Response Strongly disagree.
There is a gap of 352.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2018 in Response Somewhat agree and Strongly disagree.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Responses for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 3 groups, 2018 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Somewhat agree and 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Strongly disagree.
In Response Somewhat agree, 2018 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Response Strongly disagree out of all 5 Responses.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2018 that was found in Response Somewhat agree was 5.29 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Strongly disagree.
Among all 3 groups, 2018 had the gap of 352.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Somewhat agree and Strongly disagree respectively.
2018 had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 3 groups in Response Somewhat agree followed by 2018 in Somewhat agree, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for 2018 in Strongly disagree.
On average, the Response Somewhat agree had the highest SOME LABEL for all 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Strongly disagree had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
